content: Doesn’t seem appropriate a day before Easter, but Comey’s timing has always been impeccable. Good time to share my favorite recipe for Deviled Eggs with Cheetos? Ingredients: 14 hard-boiled eggs 1/2 cup mayonnaise 1/2 cup sour cream 1 1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/4 cup finely chopped Cheetos 2 tablespoons fresh chives or green onion tops Instructions: Cut eggs in half, lengthwise. Remove yolks to medium bowl. Reserve 24 white halves. Finely chop remaining four white halves. Mash yolks with fork. Add mayonnaise, sour cream, mustard, lemon juice and pepper; mix well. Add chopped egg whites, Cheetos and chives; mix well. Spoon heaping 1 tablespoon egg yolk mixture onto each reserved egg white half. Refrigerate, covered to blend flavors. Note: Lucifer proxy paprika should be generously sprinkled on the eggs for that tactless Trump tint.
